LanguageData.AS_WHE_EngineerTrait.degreeDatas.0.label: Half Elf Engineer Apprentice
LanguageData.AS_WHE_EngineerTrait.degreeDatas.0.descr: I am interested in the technology of ancient races and am learning to use it to improve my half-elf skills.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_EngineerTrait.degreeDatas.1.label: Half-Elf Engineer
LanguageData.AS_WHE_EngineerTrait.degreeDatas.1.descr: Knowledgeable about ancient race technology and committed to improving it in combination with half-elf technology.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_EngineerTrait.degreeDatas.2.label: Half-Elf Machinist
LanguageData.AS_WHE_EngineerTrait.degreeDatas.2.descr: Have knowledge of the technology of the ancient races, and have the technology and experience of Half-El technology that makes use of that knowledge.
